thread.section_title: Castlegatelights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Castlegatelights | castlegatelights.co.uk | 5 of 252
thread.title: Noel Humphreys

author: Noel Humphreys
title: Noel Humphreys
text: I bought a Tiffany style light fitting and needed confirmation that the company could deliver to my address, I don't live in the UK. They were very helpful and kept me informed of the progress of the order throughout my purchase process. When the light fitting arrived it was REALLY WELL protected. Thank you Castlegatelights for being an excellent company to buy from.
